Package de.dhbw.ravensburg.zuul.creature

Class Creature

java.lang.Object
de.dhbw.ravensburg.zuul.creature.Creature
Direct Known Subclasses:
Animal, Human
public class Creature
extends java.lang.Object
Class Creature - a creature in an adventure game. This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game. A "Creature" can be an "Animal" or an "Human". Creatures have different abilities and can help or attack you. "Creature" is the superclasse from "Animal" and "Human".
Version:
2020.05.02
Author:
Moritz Link

  • Constructor Details

    • Creature

      public Creature​(java.lang.String name, boolean innocent, int damage, Item drop)
      Create a "Creature" with different values: name, innocent, damage, drop. This constructor is used for "Animals".
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the creature.
      innocent - If the creature is innocent.
      damage - how string the creature can damage the player.
      drop - the Item the creature drops when it dies.

    • Creature

      public Creature​(java.lang.String name, boolean innocent, Item drop)
      Create a "Creature" with different values: name, innocent, drop. This constructor is used for "Human".
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the creature.
      innocent - If the creature is innocent.
      drop - the Item the creature drops when it dies.

    • Creature

      name - The name of the creature.
      innocent - If the Creature is innocent.
